reviewText: A wonderful concert to watch. Highly recommended for those who have yet to get this.

I've been a fan of Unheilig for a couple of years and missed out on their Kopfkino DVD, so when I saw Vorhang Auf, I had to grab it. I expected to have difficulty viewing it, since most DVDs of that nature are Region 2, but I was absolutely delighted to discover that it is region free or "Codeless".

This is a must have for any Unheilig fans with the great camera work and other features, it was just awesome.
